name: Dieselpunk
description:
Year 2179. Earth is at an end. Humanity was forced to flee and seek shelter in the sky.

The Ark was created, carrying the last survivors. Humanity begun looking for a new home.

Low on supplies, they settled. Barren on the surface, but rich of resources underneath.

A new beginning awaits...

How to play:
  • Your goal is to upgrade The Ark up to the 9th level
  • The Ark needs fuel. If the pressure goes down to zero - you lose
  • You can harvest fuel by placing pumps on fuel deposits (Press 2, then click on the deposit) and connecting them to the city (Press 3, then click on the pump, then on the city).
  • Pipes can not intersect each other and nodes
Controls:
  • 1 - Selection mode
  • 2 - Node placement mode
  • 3 - Pipe placement mode
  • 4 - Deletion mode
  • 5 - Upgrade mode
Authors:
  • iv2b - Game design, programming
  • SmelJey - Programming, visual effects
  • Pheo - Art
  • OfficialGrubber - Music and sound effects [Spotify] [Discord:OfficialGruber#8320]

Game for the Brackeys 2023.1 Game jam
